#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<climits>
#include<vector>
#include<bitset>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<set>
#include<queue>
#include<stack> 
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
void read(int &x) {
   register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}

inline void PutNo(long long n)
{
long long i=0;
char ch[20];
if(n<=0)
if(n==0) putchar_unlocked('0');
else putchar_unlocked('-'),n=n*-1;
while(n>0)
ch[i]=(n%10)+'0',n=n/10,i++;
while(i>0)
putchar_unlocked(ch[i-1]),i--;
putchar_unlocked(' ');
}
int dig(int n){
    int r,s=0;
    while(n){
        r=n%10;
        if(r&1)
            s+=r;
        else
            s+=(2*r);
        n/=10;
    }
    return s%10;
}

int main(){
    int n,m,q,r,flag=0;
    int test;
    read(test);
    while(test--){
        read(n);read(m);
        flag=0;
        if(n==m)
            printf("%d\n",dig(n));
        else if(m-n<=10){
            for(int j=n;j<=m;j++){
                flag+=dig(j);
            }
            printf("%d\n",flag);
        }
        else{
            int mi,mx;
            while(n%10!=0){
                flag+=dig(n);
                n++;
            }
            mi=n;
            while(m%10!=0){
                flag+=dig(m);
                m--;
            }
            flag+=dig(m);
            m--;
            mx=m;
            if(mi==mx+1){
                printf("%d\n",flag);
            }
            else{
                flag+=((mx-mi+1)/10)*45;
                printf("%d\n",flag);
            }
        }
    }
      //#ifdef debug
//    fprintf(stdout,"\nTIME: %.3lf sec\n", (double)clock()/(CLOCKS_PER_SEC));  
   // // #endif
    return 0;
}//end main
